archetypes.name: The Heartfelt Companion
archetypes.title: Connection-Focused Partner
archetypes.description: You prioritize emotional connection and togetherness above all else. Your partner's happiness is your happiness, and you create deep bonds through shared experiences.
traits: Values shared experiences over individual adventures
Sacrifices personal preferences for relationship harmony
Thrives on intimate moments and deep conversations

archetypes.name: The Strategic Navigator
archetypes.title: Logic-Driven Planner
archetypes.description: You approach relationships and travel with careful planning and practical thinking. You create well-organized adventures through efficient decision-making.
traits: Makes decisions based on logic and efficiency
Values practical solutions over emotional responses
Creates structure and organization in relationships
Focuses on long-term benefits and outcomes

archetypes.name: The Spontaneous Explorer
archetypes.title: Adventure-Seeking Spirit
archetypes.description: You embrace the unexpected and thrive on new experiences. You bring excitement to relationships through your adventurous approach to life.
traits: Brings excitement and adventure to relationships
